amendment.description: To require a report on the development of a second source for tire production and supply for the Stryker combat vehicle.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1574 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1574 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To require a report on the development of a second source for tire production and supply for the Stryker combat vehicle.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1574 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1574 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Voinovich.
